sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import {
  Text,
  Box,
  ScrollView,
  HStack,
  View,
  Input,
  Pressable,
  Select,
  CheckIcon,
  Button,
  VStack,
  Divider,
  Avatar,
  Image,
} from "native-base";
import HomeProducts from "../Components/HomeProducts";
import Colors from "../color";
import { ActivityIndicator, RefreshControl } from "react-native";
import {
  Ionicons,
  MaterialIcons,
  MaterialCommunityIcons,
  SimpleLineIcons,
} from "@expo/vector-icons";
import axios from "axios";

const Url = `http://192.168.1.7:5000`;

function PaymentScreen({ navigation }) {
  return (
    <Box flex={1}>
      <HStack
        space={3}
        w="full"
        px={4}
        bg="#FFA500"
        py={3}
        alignItems="center"
        safeAreaTop
      >
        <Pressable onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}>
          <Ionicons name="arrow-back" size={24} color="white" />
        </Pressable>
        <Text bold fontSize={17} color="white">
          Xác nhận đơn hàng
        </Text>
      </HStack>
      <ScrollView showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
        <View alignItems="center" mt={5}>
          <HStack>
            <VStack alignItems="center">
              <MaterialCommunityIcons
                name="clipboard-clock-outline"
                size={30}
                color="gray"
              />
              <Text color="gray.700" fontSize={10}>
                Nhận đơn
              </Text>
            </VStack>
            <Divider orientation="horizontal" w={10} my={5} borderWidth={0.8} />
            <VStack alignItems="center">
              <Ionicons name="ios-location-sharp" size={29} color="gray" />
              <Text color="gray.700" fontSize={10}>
                Chốt đơn
              </Text>
            </VStack>
            <Divider orientation="horizontal" w={10} my={5} borderWidth={0.8} />
            <VStack alignItems="center">
              <MaterialIcons name="delivery-dining" size={30} color="gray" />
              <Text color="gray.700" fontSize={10}>
                Giao hàng
              </Text>
            </VStack>
            <Divider orientation="horizontal" w={10} my={5} borderWidth={0.8} />
            <VStack alignItems="center">
              <MaterialCommunityIcons
                name="archive-check"
                size={30}
                color="gray"
              />
              <Text color="gray.700" fontSize={10}>
                Hoàn tất
              </Text>
            </VStack>
          </HStack>
        </View>

        <Divider orientation="horizontal" my={5} bg="gray.300" />

        <View px={5}>
          <HStack justifyContent="space-between">
            <View flexDirection="row">
              <SimpleLineIcons name="location-pin" size={24} color="#009900" />
              <Text bold ml={1} fontSize={17} color="#009900">
                Địa chỉ người nhận
              </Text>
            </View>
            <Pressable>
              <Text bold color="#009999">
                THAY ĐỔI
              </Text>
            </Pressable>
          </HStack>
          <HStack mt={2}>
            <VStack>
              <Text color="gray.500" fontSize={16}>
                Tên người nhận
              </Text>
              <Text color="gray.500" fontSize={16}>
                Số điện thoại
              </Text>
              <Text color="gray.500" fontSize={16}>
                Địa chỉ
              </Text>
            </VStack>
            <VStack ml={2} w={200}>
              <Text bold fontSize={16}>
                Thắng trần
              </Text>
              <Text bold fontSize={16}>
                0123123132
              </Text>
              <Text bold isTruncated numberOfLines={2} fontSize={16}>
                K572 Hoàng diệu
              </Text>
            </VStack>
          </HStack>
        </View>
        <Divider orientation="horizontal" my={5} bg="gray.300" />

        <View px={5}>
          <HStack alignItems="center" space={3}>
            <Avatar
              size="sm"
              source={{
                uri: "https://img.freepik.com/free-vector/businessman-character-avatar-isolated_24877-60111.jpg?w=2000",
              }}
            />
            <Text bold>Thắng</Text>
          </HStack>
          <HStack mt={5} space={5}>
            <Image
              source={{
                uri: "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1191017013/vector/people-set.jpg?s=612x612&w=0&k=20&c=1rxP6FhULJoXcFpaFs_9LUa4jwUUbuKJceCg3R24rL4=",
              }}
              height={70}
              width={70}
              alt="a"
            />
            <VStack>
              <Text>Trứng vịt đồng</Text>
              <Text>59.000đ</Text>
              <Text>Hải châu, Đà nẵng</Text>
            </VStack>
          </HStack>
        </View>
      </ScrollView>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default PaymentScreen;
